description.title: S.H.E. Pool Designs
description: SHE Designs Specializes in developing 3-D pool and spa Backyard Designs. We use a specialized Program to create real 3D view of your Existing house with the new backyard design that you have been drea…

bio:
Services page 
      Standard $499
• Pool and spa deign 
• Backyard conceptual landscape
• Rear section of the house design
• Deck
• 2 meetings
• The first meeting is a design consultation. We will also take any necessary measurements of the property as needed. At this meeting if applicable we would obtain a plot plan depicting property lines. If plot plans are not available there will be a one-time charge of eighty-five dollars to obtain a plot plan.
• The finameeting includes a presentation of the finished design displayed on your TV or Computer for a virtual walk through of your backyard escape. During the presentation you will get the opportunity to make changes to the final design.
• Additional Charges after the final presentation will be twenty-five dollars per modification
• Two sets of twenty-four inch by thirty-six inch plans with all specifications included

Premium
• Pool and spa Design 
• Complete house design 
• Conceptual Backyard design 
• Lighting 
• Outdoor kitchen
• Fire it 
• Deck
• 3 meetings 
• The first meeting is a design consultation. We will also take any necessary measurements of the property as needed. At this meeting if applicable we would obtain a plot plan depicting property lines. If plot plans are not available there will be a one-time charge of eighty-five dollars to obtain a plot plan.
• The second consultation meeting is optional. We can meet to discuss optional design layout and material selection before the Final presentation
• The Final meeting includes a presentation of the finished design displayed on your TV or Computer for a virtual walk through of your backyard escape. During the presentation you will get the opportunity to make changes to the final design.
• Additional Charges after the final presentation will be twenty-five dollars per modification
• Two sets of twenty-four inch by thirty-six inch plans with all specifications included




Custom
• Pool and Spa Design 
• Complete h

commnet: We are very pleased with Inderjeet Bedi. His firm is very organized and well skill. He communicates well and his creativity was appreciated. We look forward to using him on future projects.
I am very pleased with the work of Inderjeet Bedi. His skills and communication were something that we appreciated. We recommend their services.

Inderjeet & his creative staff are first class all the way. Even though I was not totally prepared they were able to capture my vision and bring it to pass. Reasonable and fair rates for the highest quality work. I highly recommend them for any firms project needs. Thanks go out to Inderjeet & the …Read More

A real pleasure to work with. Inderjeet has the perfect combination of skills and personality to make OUR vision a reality, rather than making HIS vision OUR reality. Very rare in artistic personalities, and even more difficult to find.
